prompt: <description>**Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with two circular holes on opposite sides. The holes are centered on the longer sides of the prism. The prism is solid and has a flat bottom.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.1875, 0.0] Create the first face (face\\_1) with the following parameters: Draw a loop (loop\\_1) with the following sequence of curves: - line\\_1: Start Point = [0.0, 0.0], End Point = [0.75, 0.0] - line\\_2: Start Point = [0.75, 0.0], End Point = [0.75, 0.2812] - line\\_3: Start Point = [0.75, 0.2812], End Point = [0.0, 0.2812] - line\\_4: Start Point = [0.0, 0.2812], End Point = [0.0, 0.0] Close the loop properly. Draw a second loop (loop\\_2) with a circle: - circle\\_1: Center = [0.1168, 0.131], Radius = 0.0937 Draw a third loop (loop\\_3) with a circle: - circle\\_1: Center = [0.4631, 0.131], Radius = 0.0937 Scale the 2D sketch using the scaling parameter sketch\\_scale with a value of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D-space using the following euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal vector with the given extrude\\_depth\\_towards\\_normal of 0.1875. The extrusion\\_depth\\_opposite\\_normal is 0.0. This operation creates a new solid body forming the rectangular prism with two circular holes. The length of the prism is approximately 0.75, the width is about 0.1875, and the height is also around 0.75 (same as length).</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.1875,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.2812]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.2812],"End Point":[0.0,0.2812]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.2812],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}},"loop_2":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.1168,0.131],"Radius":0.0937}},"loop_3":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.4631,0.131],"Radius":0.0937}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1875,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>

prompt: <description>**Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a hollow center** Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a hollow center, featuring a flat bottom and a flat top. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The hollow center is a smaller rectangular prism with a flat bottom and a flat top. The dimensions of the hollow center are half the width and half the height of the outer prism. The sides of the hollow center are parallel to the sides of the outer prism. 1. **Create a new coordinate system**: Set the euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] degrees and the translation vector to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]. 2. **Generate the outline of the prism's base (face_1)**: 2.1. Loop_1: a. Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.0]. b. Draw a line from point [0.75, 0.0] to point [0.75, 0.4614]. c. Draw a line from point [0.75, 0.4614] to point [0.0, 0.4614]. d. Draw a line from point [0.0, 0.4614] to point [0.0, 0.0]. 2.2. Loop_2: a. Draw a line from point [0.0231, 0.0231] to point [0.7269, 0.0231]. b. Draw a line from point [0.7269, 0.0231] to point [0.7269, 0.4383]. c. Draw a line from point [0.7269, 0.4383] to point [0.0231, 0.4383]. d. Draw a line from point [0.0231, 0.4383] to point [0.0231, 0.0231]. 3. **Transform the 2D sketch to 3D**: Scale the 2D sketch using a factor of 0.75. Apply the extrusion operation with the following properties: a. Extrude depth towards normal: 0.4614 units. b. Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 units. c. Sketch scale: 0.75. d. Boolean operation: Create a new solid body (the default operation). The dimensions of the part are as follows: - Length: 0.75 units. - Width: 0.75 units. - Height: 0.4614 units. **Part Completion** With these instructions in mind, the junior CAD designer should be able to create the given prism, including its hollow center, and accurately dimension all faces, lines, and arcs. This ensures that the final shape will be consistent with the instructions provided in the CAD Assembly JSON.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.4614]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.4614],"End Point":[0.0,0.4614]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.4614],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}},"loop_2":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0231,0.0231],"End Point":[0.7269,0.0231]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.7269,0.0231],"End Point":[0.7269,0.4383]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.7269,0.4383],"End Point":[0.0231,0.4383]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0231,0.4383],"End Point":[0.0231,0.0231]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.4614,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
